ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.GestaoDeProjetos import GPProjetos
projetoConcluido = GPProjetos.ProjetoConcluido(widget.Entity.ProjetoHandle)
if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = widget.Entity.PermiteManterAnexos and not projetoConcluido if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = widget.Entity.PermiteManterAnexos and not projetoConcluido if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] != None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = widget.Entity.PermiteManterAnexos and not projetoConcluido
